VIII.iv.4.B.6.b
.
SMC Under PL 79-182
PL 79-182
, effective October 1, 1945, provided for payment of SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(o)
for
bilateral blindness, with visual acuity of 5/200 (1.5/60) or less, in combination with bilateral total deafness, and/or
transverse myelitis, with loss of use of both legs and loss of anal and bladder control.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B - History of Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B
